desc.en: Tired and exhausted from trying to catch up on work, Sensei heads to the lounge. There they run into Akane, who asks if there's anything she can do to help, and she ends up lending a hand with cleaning. Afterwards, Akane asks if there's anything else she can do, but Sensei ends up falling asleep from exhaustion and Akane leaves quietly.
desc.jp: Tired and exhausted from trying to catch up on work, Sensei heads to the lounge. There they run into Akane, who asks if there's anything she can do to help, and she ends up lending a hand with cleaning. Afterwards, Akane asks if there's anything else she can do, but Sensei ends up falling asleep from exhaustion and Akane leaves quietly.
desc.zh_cn: 在结束与文档山的战斗的老师面前，打扮成兔女郎的{cf朱音}出现了。与询问是否需要什么服务的{cf朱音}一起进行了{et夏莱}的清扫。在打扫干净后，喝了{cf朱音}泡的茶，老师缓缓进入了梦乡。

desc.en: Azusa comes to the Schale office to say that Sensei and Schale's security is lacking. However, she then falls asleep while waiting in the comfortable office. Having felt safe enough to sleep there, Azusa retracts her statement.
desc.jp: Azusa comes to the Schale office to say that Sensei and Schale's security is lacking. However, she then falls asleep while waiting in the comfortable office. Having felt safe enough to sleep there, Azusa retracts her statement.
desc.zh_cn: 来到{et夏莱}办公室的{cf梓}向老师说{et夏莱}的保安措施太马虎，建议要加强。然而正在等待老师工作结束的{cf梓}，不知不觉睡着了。醒来之后，觉得维持现在的氛围比较好，于是收回了之前说的话。
等下，接下来要发生什么？！举例：第137首曲子

desc.en: Sensei invites Kasumi to Schale. Kasumi brings various books on civil engineering, geology, and architectural engineering and begins to study. Sensei tells her that she can visit anytime she wants, and they spend some time chatting.

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Kazusa suddenly visits Schale. She had bought some fondant au chocolat, but she has a hard time eating hot food, so she offers it to Sensei instead. Sensei tells her that someone who can't eat hot food is said to have a "cat's tongue," but Kazusa doesn't understand what that means.
desc.jp: Kazusa suddenly visits Schale. She had bought some fondant au chocolat, but she has a hard time eating hot food, so she offers it to Sensei instead. Sensei tells her that someone who can't eat hot food is said to have a "cat's tongue," but Kazusa doesn't understand what that means.
desc.zh_cn: {cf千纱}突然来访{et夏莱}。{cf千纱}说虽然买了「翻糖巧克力」，但因为自己吃不了太烫的东西，为了给老师才会特别来{et夏莱}。老师虽然向{cf千纱}说她是「猫舌头」，但是{cf千纱}似乎不太知道那个意思。

hobby.jp: 「普通に」スイーツを食べること

desc.zh_cn: 在因缘际会之下，{cf亚都梨}得知老师有个问题想问她。满怀着期待的{cf亚都梨}找到老师后，她才惊觉老师想问的问题竟然与自己有关。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: One day, the Ninjutsu Research Club suddenly visits Sensei at Schale. They want Sensei to help them in their mission to become an official club. As Michiru is trying to convince Sensei, Kaho from the Yin-Yang Club shows up at Schale.

desc.zh_cn: 某天{cn忍术研究部}的成员们突然来找{et夏莱}的老师。就在{cf三千留}声称希望老师可以帮忙，让{cn忍术研究部}成为正式社团，发动美人计等让老师感到困惑的那个时候。正好{cn阴阳部}的{cf佳穗}来到{et夏莱}。

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.jp: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?
desc.zh_cn:
为了成为正式的社团，{cn忍术研究部}决定协助{sn百鬼夜行}和{sn格黑娜}的交流会。
然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: The Ninjutsu Research Club helps run the Hyakkiyako and Gehenna meeting so they can earn official club status.Will they be able to pull it off?

然而这两所学园的交流会想必无法风平浪静地结束……
面对眼前各式各样的问题，少女们得出的答案究竟会是什么呢！？

desc.en: After the successful exchange meeting, everything goes back to normal. Then Niya appears in front of Sensei and confesses that she plotted everything to see Sensei's skills, and Sensei thoroughly scolds Niya.
desc.jp: After the successful exchange meeting, everything goes back to normal. Then Niya appears in front of Sensei and confesses that she plotted everything to see Sensei's skills, and Sensei thoroughly scolds Niya.
desc.zh_cn: 在交流会顺利结束后，一切都恢复原状。最后出现在老师面前的仁耶坦白说，这次的事情都是为了看到老师的实力而策划的，老师便毫不犹豫训斥仁耶。

desc.en: Sensei visits the After-School Sweets Club to check on the situation. Natsu and Airi say they don't know what happened between Kazusa and Reisa, but it won't change their relationship with everyone. Sensei is relieved, but accidentally shows something to everyone in the After-School Sweets Club.

desc.zh_cn: 老师为了确认大家的情况而造访了{cn放学后的甜点部}的部室。{cf夏}和{cf爱莉}说虽然不知道{cf千纱}和{cf澪纱}之间发生过什么事，但是说和大家的关系并没有因此而改变。感到安心的老师因为失误而将一张照片传给了所有{cn放学后的甜点部}。

desc.en: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.jp: Kazusa asks Sensei for advice. Kazusa's complex and somewhat odd worries seem to be rooted in her past. Unpredictability and intensity suddenly rule Kazusa and the After-School Sweets Club's daily life! How will the scandalous consultation end?
desc.zh_cn:
老师从{cn放学后的甜点部}的{cf千纱}那里收到了咨询的请求。
似乎和她的过去有关──
突然闯入平凡少女的日常生活，
这无法预测的故事，将会走向什么样的结局……！？

desc.en: Fuuka says that eating only sweets on Valentine's Day isn't healthy, so she prepares a packed lunch. Sensei enjoys some hot chocolate after the meal and points out that the two of them have matching mugs, causing a bashful Fuuka to run away.
desc.jp: Fuuka says that eating only sweets on Valentine's Day isn't healthy, so she prepares a packed lunch. Sensei enjoys some hot chocolate after the meal and points out that the two of them have matching mugs, causing a bashful Fuuka to run away.
desc.zh_cn: 因为认为情人节一整天只吃甜食有害健康，因此{cf风华}特地为老师准备了便当。用完餐后，喝着热可可的老师忽然提到他们手上的马克杯设计很像，让害羞得不知该如何是好的{cf风华}立即转身逃跑。

desc.en: Sensei is flustered when Akane rummages through her bag to present them with something, but it just turns out to be her homemade chocolate. Akane and Sensei share the chocolate as student and teacher instead of maid and master, if only just for the day.

desc.zh_cn: 老师一脸不知所措地看着不停翻找着背包的{cf朱音}。历经了千辛万苦后，{cf朱音}才终于从书包中找到她特地准备的手工巧克力。唯独今天，{cf朱音}希望她能和老师以普通师生的身分一起享用情人节巧克力。
